page.title: 08Housing in Whitminster.
page.content:
In recent years there has been a lot of building in Whitminster. there are 33 houses left in Whitminster which were built before the war. Two of these date from the Middle Ages and are of similar design.
Yewtree Cottage is one of the medieval cottages. It used to be thatched with wooden supports but it hs been modernised.
Along School Lane there are 24 houses built after 1945. They are all large houses built to individual plans and standing in large areas of land.
There are four small estates built on the outskirts of Whitminster. These are small modern houses designed for first time buyers or young families.
